title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6700.7 - Records access officer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6700.7 - Records access officer

State Regulations

The records access officer is responsible for making
available to the public those records requested in compliance with the law and
procedure described above. All inquiries regarding public access to the
commission's records should be directed to the records access officer at the
offices of the commission. The records access officer is Mrs. Astrid

DeFarkas. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6700.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
